cleaned_text: This note sets out simple principles for responsible collecting. It relates to the guidance on managing geological specimen collecting in TIN111. It is available on [The National Archive](http://webarchive.nationalarchives.gov.uk/20160105000001/http%3A//publications.naturalengland.org.uk/publication/1644830).
